original_title: Smoky Mountain Explorer - An Island in the Sky
overview: Take a video journey to the Top of Old Smoky, Clingmans Dome, the highest peak in the Great Smoky Mountains. View astonishing footage of rivers of clouds, sunrises, wildlife, wildflowers, and the turn of the seasons atop this island in the sky.
tagline: Clingmans Dome and the Spruce-Fir Forests
title: Smoky Mountain Explorer - An Island in the Sky
